Package model.io

Class PacketTracer

java.lang.Object
model.io.PacketTracer
public class PacketTracer extends Object
Class used to trace all packets transmissions It uses Singleton design pattern.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static PacketTracer getInstance()
      Get the instance of PacketTracer. Construct it if not already created.
      Returns:
      The instance of PacketTracer

    • tracePacket

      public void tracePacket(int nodeId, Layer layer, PacketEvent event, Packet packet)
      Write a new line to the log file, corresponding to a packet. Write the details of the node calling the tracer, and the details of the packet
      Parameters:
      nodeId - ID of the node tracing the packet
      layer - Layer of the node that calls the trace
      event - Event on the packet
      packet - The packet to trace
